If you cannot add any tokens to the chaos bag, the performing investigator gets [advantage] for this test.
cards.name: Bless
cards.text: Cleric deck only. Customizable. [concentration] Sanity. Expire 3. [reaction] After Bless enters play: Choose up to 2 investigators at your location without a copy of Blessed under their control. Search your bonded cards for Blessed and put one into play under the control of each chosen investigator.

cards.name: Guiding Bolt
cards.text: Cleric deck only. Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] and get +1 skill value for this attack. If you succeed, deal +1 damage and the next attack performed against the attacked enemy gets [advantage].

cards.name: Warding Bond
cards.text:
Cleric deck only.
Play Warding Bond under the control of another investigator at your location.
At any time, you may reveal your hand to Warding Bond's owner, and vice versa. You may play events and commit skill cards from their hand as if those cards were in your hand.

cards.name: Spirit Guardians
cards.text: Cleric deck only. [concentration] Sanity. [reaction] When an enemy enters your location, or vice versa: Test [willpower] (3). If a [bless] or [elder_sign] token was revealed during this test, deal 1 damage to that enemy. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to that enemy. Cannot be triggered on engaged enemies moving with you.

cards.name: Sacred Flame
cards.text: Cleric deck only. Attach Sacred Flame to your location. Group limit 1 in play. Reduce the resource cost of cards played at attached location by 1. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Sacred Flame.

cards.name: Divine Intervention
cards.text:
Cleric deck only.
Fast. Play when an investigator reveals a chaos token.
Cancel all revealed tokens and treat them as an [elder_sign] token, instead. Remove 1 doom from the current agenda and exile Divine Intervention. When earning experience during the resolution of this scenario, you earn 5 additional experience. (Max once per campaign.)

cards.name: Thorn Whip
cards.text:
Druid deck only.
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose a connecting location. Move a card attached to that location, non-[[Elite]] enemy, or clue from that location to your location.

cards.name: Spreading Spores
cards.text:
Spore Druid deck only. Exceptional.
[free] Take 1 damage or 1 horror: Gain 1 resource.
[reaction] After a card at your location is defeated, or discarded from play, your hand, or your deck, exhaust Spreading Spores: Play a card from your discard pile. Increase the resource cost of that card by 1.

cards.name: Moonbeam
cards.text: Druid deck only. [concentration] Health or Sanity. Parley. Attach to your location. Attached location gets -1 shroud. [reaction] After you attach Moonbeam to a location: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at that location. [action] Detach Moonbeam from your location: Attach it to a connecting location.

cards.name: Plant Growth
cards.text: Druid and Ranger deck only. Attach to your location and place 1 horror on it, as growth. If Plant Growth leaves play, discard all growth. Clues at any location with growth may be treated as if they were at another location with growth. Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 growth on a location with no growth connected to a location with growth.

cards.name: Wall of Thorns
cards.text: Druid deck only. [concentration] Health or Sanity. Parley. Attach to your location. [reaction] After an enemy enters attached location: Exhaust that enemy and place 1 damage on attached location, as a flammable token. [free]: Discard a non-weakness treachery attached to attached location.

cards.name: Heroes' Feast
cards.text:
Cleric and Druid deck only.
For each effect below, choose an investigator at your location to resolve it. (Max once per game):
- Place 3 uses on an asset you control.
- Heal 2 damage and 2 horror.
- Gain 5 resources.
- Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Extra Attack
cards.text: Fighter deck only. Fast. Play after you resolve a fight ability on a card you control. Resolve its effects again. You get +2 skill value and [advantage] for this test. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may shuffle Extra Attack into your deck at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Indomitable
cards.text:
Fighter deck only. Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Indomitable: Cancel all effects of the failed test. Attempt the test again using a different skill of your choice.

cards.name: Heavy Armor Master
cards.text:
Fighter deck only. Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
You get +1 health.
You have 1 additional hand or body slot.

cards.name: Great Weapon Master
cards.text:
Fighter deck only. Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
[reaction] When you would succeed at a skill test during an attack with a [[Weapon]] asset that takes up at least 2 hand slots, exhaust Great Weapon Master: You get -2 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack.

cards.name: Alert
cards.text:
Fighter deck only. Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
You get +1 sanity.
Play with the top card of the encounter deck revealed.

cards.name: Extra Attack
cards.text: Fighter deck only. Fast. Play after you resolve a fight ability on a card you control. Resolve its effects again. You get +3 skill value and [advantage] for this test. If you succeed, you may shuffle Extra Attack into your deck at the end of your turn. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may return it to your hand at the end of your turn instead.

cards.name: Purity of Body
cards.text:
Monk deck only.
After you commit Purity of Body to a skill test, heal 1 damage or horror.
While Purity of Body is committed to a skill test during an unarmed action, it gains [wild] [wild].

cards.name: Stillness of Mind
cards.text:
Monk deck only.
After you commit Stillness of Mind to a skill test, draw 1 card.
While Stillness of Mind is committed to a skill test during an unarmed action, it gains   [wild] [wild].

cards.name: Step of the Wind
cards.text:
Monk deck only.
After you commit Step of the Wind to a skill test, you may shuffle an asset in your play area into your deck. Then, play an asset from your hand reducing its cost by the cost of the shuffled asset.
While Step of the Wind is committed to a skill test during an unarmed action, it gains [wild] [wild].

cards.name: Martial Arts
cards.text:
Monk deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] When you play an event, exhaust Martial Arts: This action is considered "unarmed".
[reaction] After you perform an attack using a [[Melee]] card, exhaust Martial Arts: Take an unarmed action.

cards.name: Deflect Missiles
cards.text:
Monk deck only.
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location is dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 3 damage and/or horror just dealt to them. Then, you may spend 1 ki from Monk to deal that much damage to an enemy at your location.

cards.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
cards.text: Four Elements Monk deck only. Ignite. Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, replenish 1 ki on Monk. You may spend 1 ki from Monk to target an enemy at a location up to 3 connections away. This action is considered "unarmed".

cards.name: Aura of Protection
cards.text:
Paladin deck only.
Investigators at your location get +2 skill value while resolving an ability on a treachery card.

cards.name: Divine Smite
cards.text:
Paladin deck only.
Fast. Play after you successfully attack an enemy.
Deal an additional damage for this attack. If you defeat the attacked enemy with this attack, add 2 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.

cards.name: Dreadful Aspect
cards.text:
Oathbreaker Paladin deck only.
After this test ends, add Dreadful Aspect to your play area as an asset with the text:
"[reaction] After you reveal a [curse] token: Place 1 offering on Dreadful Aspect. If there are 6 offerings on Dreadful Aspect, add it to the victory display."

cards.name: Aura of Courage
cards.text:
Paladin deck only, except Oathbreaker.
Investigators at your location get +1 [combat]. 
[reaction] When your turn begins: Seal a [bless] token from the token pool on a [[Blessed]] asset you control or add a [bless] token to the chaos bag. If you cannot, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Aura of Hate
cards.text:
Oathbreaker Paladin deck only.
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [combat].
[reaction] When you reveal a [curse] token, exhaust Aura of Hate: You may take an additional action during your turn this round.

cards.name: Divine Smite
cards.text:
Paladin deck only.
Fast. Play after you successfully attack an enemy.
Deal 3 additional damage for this attack. If you defeat the attacked enemy with this attack, add 5 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. For each [bless] token you cannot, heal 1 damage or horror.

cards.name: Hunter's Mark
cards.text: Ranger deck only. Fast. Uses (3 charges). [concentration] Health. You get +1 skill value while fighting an enemy with 1 or more bounties on it. [free] Exhaust Hunter's Mark and spend 1 charge: Place 1 resource from the token pool on an enemy in play, as a bounty. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy with 1 or more bounties on it: Discover 1 clue from its location.

cards.name: Urban Tracker
cards.text:
Ranger deck only. Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this skill test is successful, add Urban Tracker to your play area as an asset with 1 trust token on it and the text:
"[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, discard Urban Tracker: For each trust token on it, discover 1 clue at your location."

cards.name: Wasteland Wanderer
cards.text:
Ranger deck only. Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this skill test is successful, add Wasteland Wanderer to your play area as an asset with 1 trust token on it and the text:
"[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, discard Wasteland Wanderer: For each trust token on it, draw 1 card or gain 1 resource."

cards.name: Beast Tamer
cards.text:
Ranger deck only. Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this skill test is successful, add Beast Tamer to your play area as an asset with 1 trust token on it and the text:
"[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, discard Beast Tamer: For each trust token on it, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location."

cards.name: Lightning Arrow
cards.text: Ranger deck only. Fast. Play during any [free] window. Fight. You may use your [agility] instead of [combat] and get [advantage] for this attack. For each card committed to this test, deal +1 damage (max +2 damage).

cards.name: Conjure Barrage
cards.text: Ranger deck only. Fight. This attack chooses and targets a revealed location. Test [combat] or [agility] (X), where X is that location's shroud. If you succeed, instead of standard damage, you may assign up to 6 damage among enemies at that location (any additional damage adds to this total).

cards.name: Cunning Action
cards.text:
Rogue deck only. Fast. Play during your turn.
Myriad. Limit 1 Cunning Action (Dash) per deck.
Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location. Resolve this effect again. Search your deck for a different Cunning Action, draw it, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Cunning Action
cards.text:
Rogue deck only. Fast. Play during your turn.
Myriad. Limit 1 Cunning Action (Disengage) per deck.
Disengage up to 2 enemies at your location from all investigators. Until the end of your turn, they cannot engage any investigator. Search your deck for a different Cunning Action, draw it, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Cunning Action
cards.text:
Rogue deck only. Fast. Play during your turn.
Myriad. Limit 1 Cunning Action (Hide) per deck.
Choose up to 2 enemies at your location and exhaust them. Search your deck for a different Cunning Action, draw it, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Uncanny Dodge
cards.text: Rogue deck only. Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness encounter card. Evade. Attempt to evade that encounter card. Treacheries are treated as enemies with an evade value of 3 for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, cancel all of that card's effects. Discard it, along with each copy of it in play.

cards.name: Expertise
cards.text:
Rogue deck only.
While Expertise is committed to a skill test, it gains [wild] icons equal to your base skill value. If this test is successful, either gain 2 resources or spend 1 resource to return Expertise to your hand instead of discarding it.

cards.name: Reliable Talent
cards.text:
Rogue deck only.
Token and encounter card effects cannot reduce your skill value below 2 (except the [auto_fail] token).

cards.name: Metamagic
cards.text:
Sorcerer deck only. Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
[reaction] Before drawing your opening hand: Construct the metamagic deck. Refer to the reference guide.
[reaction] At the start of your turn: Reveal the top 2 cards of your metamagic deck. You may draw 1 non-placeholder card. Place the rest on the bottom, in any order.

cards.name: Heightened Spell
cards.text: Sorcerer deck only. Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test on a [[Spell]] card. Until the end of the round, you get [advantage] and +3 skill value during skill tests on all copies of that card.

cards.name: Extended Spell
cards.text:
Sorcerer deck only.
Fast. Play when a [[Spell]] card you control would leave play.
It cannot leave play this round. If it would leave play as a cost, that cost is considered paid.

cards.name: Subtle Spell
cards.text:
Sorcerer deck only.
Fast. Play when you play a [[Spell]] card.
Playing that card does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Reduce the cost to play it by 3. Ignore the alert, elusive, and retaliate keywords on all enemies while playing it.

cards.name: Distant Spell
cards.text:
Sorcerer deck only.
Fast. Play when you play or activate an [action] ability on a [[Spell]] card.
Play it or activate that ability at any revealed location as if you were at that location. You may do so as if you were engaged with each enemy at that location.

cards.name: Careful Spell
cards.text:
Sorcerer deck only.
Fast. Play when a [[Spell]] card would cause you to discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, take horror, or discard cards from play.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, heal horror, or play cards, respectively).

cards.name: Eldritch Blast
cards.text: Warlock deck only. Fight. Fight with any skill. This attack deals +1 damage.

cards.name: Arms of Hadar
cards.text: Warlock deck only. Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. If you succeed, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage to each enemy at the attacked enemy's location. If a symbol is revealed during this attack, deal an additional damage to each enemy (any additional damage other than this effect is dealt to the attacked enemy).

cards.name: Hex
cards.text: Warlock deck only. [concentration] Health. Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach Hex to an encounter card at your location, or not at any location. Seal up to 3 [curse] tokens from the chaos bag or the token pool on that card. Tests on or against attached card get -1 difficulty for each [curse] token sealed on it.

cards.name: Armor of Agathys
cards.text:
Warlock deck only.
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Armor of Agathys: Chill an enemy at your location.

cards.name: Hunger of Hadar
cards.text: Warlock deck only. [concentration] Health or Sanity. Attach to your location or a connecting location. [reaction] After a symbol is revealed at attached location or a connecting location: Exhaust a card at the location the symbol was revealed. Then, discover 1 clue at that location or deal 1 damage to a card at that location.

cards.name: Mystic Arcanum
cards.text:
Warlock deck only. Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
Before setting up each game, consult the Patron's Word reference guide for your task.
[reaction] When you play a [[Pact]] card, exhaust Mystic Arcanum: For each boon token here, gain 1 resource or get +1 skill value while resolving that card.

cards.name: Spell Scribing
cards.text:
Wizard deck only.
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Put Spell Scribing into play in your play area as an asset that takes up a hand slot. Then, put a [[Spell]] asset from your hand into play. At the end of your turn, if that asset is still in play, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Arcane Tradition
cards.text:
Wizard deck only. Limit 1 per investigator.
Attach Arcane Tradition to Wizard.
[reaction] When you use an ability on the attached card, exhaust Arcane Tradition: This use of this ability does not count towards its limit.

cards.name: Phantasmal Killer
cards.text: Wizard deck only. Uses (6 charges). [concentration] Sanity. [action]: Parley. Test any skill (3). If you succeed, place 1 horror on an enemy at your location. [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, remove 1 horror from it and spend 1 charge: Deal that enemy's damage and horror to any enemy at its location, instead (horror is placed on that enemy).

cards.name: Magic Initiate
cards.text:
Wizard deck only.
Search your collection for 3 of the following level 0 cards and set them aside, out of play. While set aside, you may play any of those cards as if they were in your hand. Remove Magic Initiate from the game.
Deny Existence, Ward of Protection, Ritual Candles, Uncage the Soul, Eldritch Sophist, Written in the Stars, Knowledge is Power.

cards.name: Spell Sniper
cards.text:
Wizard deck only.
If this test is successful, search your deck for a [[Spell]] card and draw it. If Spell Sniper was committed to a skill test on a [[Spell]] card, resolve 1 additional target for this search. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Prone
cards.text: Revelation - Put Prone into play in your threat area. Exhaust the asset you control with the highest printed cost. You cannot move out of your location or trigger [free] abilities. [action][action]: Discard Prone.

cards.name: Incapacitated
cards.text: Revelation - Put Incapacitated into play in your threat area and discard all concentration cards you control. You cannot play concentration cards or trigger [reaction] abilities. [action][action]: Discard Incapacitated.

cards.name: Bane
cards.text: Revelation - Put Bane into play in your threat area. Forced - When you test your highest base skill: Place 1 horror on Bane. You get -1 to your highest base skill(s) for each horror here. [action][action]: Discard Bane.

cards.name: Cursed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Cursed into play in your threat area. Forced - At the start of the round: Add 2 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. Double the modifier on [curse] tokens you reveal. [action][action]: Discard Cursed.

cards.name: Frightened
cards.text: Revelation - Put Frightened into play in your threat area. The first [willpower] test performed at this location each phase gets [disadvantage]. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). You may take 1 horror to get [advantage] for this test. If you succeed, discard Frightened.

cards.name: Blinded
cards.text: Revelation - Put Blinded into play in your threat area. The first [intellect] test performed at this location each phase gets [disadvantage]. [action]: Test [intellect] (3). You may take 1 horror to get [advantage] for this test. If you succeed, discard Blinded.

cards.name: Maimed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Maimed into play in your threat area. The first [combat] test performed at this location each phase gets [disadvantage]. [action]: Test [combat] (3). You may take 1 damage to get [advantage] for this test. If you succeed, discard Maimed.

cards.name: Enwebbed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Enwebbed into play in your threat area. The first [agility] test performed at this location each phase gets [disadvantage]. [action]: Test [agility] (3). You may take 1 damage to get [advantage] for this test. If you succeed, discard Enwebbed.

cards.name: Dazed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Dazed into play in your threat area. While you have X or more cards in hand, you cannot draw cards and non-weakness cards cannot be added to your hand. X is your [willpower]. [action][action]: Discard Dazed.

cards.name: Diseased
cards.text: Revelation - Put Diseased into play in your threat area. While you have X or more resources in your resource pool, you cannot gain resources. X is your [intellect]. [action][action]: Discard Diseased.

cards.name: Encumbered
cards.text: Revelation - Put Encumbered into play in your threat area. While you control X or more non-permanent assets, assets cannot enter play under your control. X is your [combat]. [action][action]: Discard Encumbered.

cards.name: Ambushed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Ambushed into play in your threat area. Forced - When an enemy is drawn at your location, if your [agility] is equal to or less than its evade: It attacks you and you lose an action. [action][action]: Discard Ambushed.

cards.name: Blessed
cards.text: Bonded (Bless). [reaction] After you initiate a skill test, exhaust Blessed: Add a [bless] token to the chaos bag. Reveal 5 random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [elder_sign] or [bless] token revealed, you get +1 skill value for this test. Forced - After Bless or Blessed leaves play: Set Blessed aside, out of play.

cards.name: Chilled
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, put Chilled into play in your threat area. Your cards cannot be exhausted or readied. [action] Discard a non-weakness asset in your play area or hand: Discard Chilled.

cards.name: Acid
cards.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). If you fail, put Acid into play in your threat area. Forced - After each test ends: Remove a card you committed to this test from the game. [action]: You get -4 skill value for your next skill test. Discard Acid.

cards.name: Burning
cards.text: Revelation - Test [combat] (4). If you fail, put Burning into play in your threat area. Forced - After you play a card: Take 1 damage. [action] Draw the topmost treachery card from the encounter discard pile: Discard Burning.

cards.name: Shocked
cards.text: Revelation - Test [intellect] (4). If you fail, put Shocked into play in your threat area. Forced - After you draw 1 or more cards during your turn: Take 1 horror. [action] Draw the topmost enemy from the encounter discard pile: Discard Shocked.

cards.name: Stunned
cards.text: Revelation - Put Stunned into play in your threat area. Treat your investigator as if their printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [reaction] When you would draw 1 or more cards during the upkeep phase: Discard Stunned instead.

cards.name: Charmed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Charmed into play in your threat area. Forced - After you reveal a non-[elder_sign] symbol: Lose 1 resource. [reaction] When you would collect resources during the upkeep phase, if it is not the same phase Charmed was drawn: Discard it instead.

cards.name: Bleeding
cards.text: Revelation - Put Bleeding into play in your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Lose an action. [free] During a skill test you are performing: You get [disadvantage] and -2 skill value for this test. Discard Bleeding.

cards.name: Paralyzed
cards.text: Revelation - Put Paralyzed into play in your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more horror: Lose an action. [free] During a skill test you are performing: You get [disadvantage] and -2 skill value for this test. Discard Paralyzed.

cards.name: Rolan
cards.text: Wizard deck only. You get [advantage] during skill tests on [[Spell]] cards. [reaction] After you reveal a chaos token during a skill test you are performing, exhaust Rolan: Return a [[Spell]] skill you committed to this test to your hand.

cards.name: Folk Hero
cards.text: After you commit Folk Hero to a skill test, engage any number of enemies at your location. For each enemy engaged this way, gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Grease
cards.text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. You may use your [willpower] or [intellect] and get +1 skill value for this test. If you succeed, place 1 damage on your location, as a flammable token. While there are 1 or more flammable tokens on your location, the ability above is a [free] ability and may target any enemy at your location.

cards.name: The Dark Urge
cards.text: Permanent. Purchase at deck creation. When you purchase The Dark Urge, add a Dark Pact basic weakness to your deck. Forced - When the game ends: If you defeated a player card with Dark Pact this game, you earn 1 additional experience.

cards.name: Torch
cards.text:
Uses (2 supplies).
[reaction] When you perform a skill test while attacking or investigating, spend 1 supply: Place 1 damage on your location, as a flammable token. This test gets -2 difficulty.
[free] Discard Torch: Place 1 damage on your location, as a flammable token.

cards.flavor: "I found this and thought of you."
cards.name: Scratch
cards.text:
While your base [intellect] is 3 or lower, you get +1 [intellect].
[free] During a skill test at your location, exhaust Scratch: The performing investigator gets +1 skill value for this skill test.

cards.name: Speak with Animals
cards.text: Uses (2 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Parley. Place 2 trust tokens on a [[Creature]] asset you control and discover 1 clue at your location.

cards.name: Barcus Wroot
cards.text: [reaction] After Barcus Wroot enters play, choose an investigator at your location: The chosen investigator reveals the top 5 cards of their deck. They choose 2 cards and draw them. Shuffle the remaining cards into their deck.

cards.name: Necromancy of Thay
cards.text: [reaction] When your turn begins: Test [willpower] (1). This test gets +2 difficulty for each horror here. If you succeed, place 1 horror here. If there are 3 or more horror, you may discard this card to draw 3 cards and record in your Campaign Log that "you unlocked Thay's forbidden knowledge". If you fail, take 1 horror.

cards.name: Returning Pike
cards.text: [reaction] After Returning Pike leaves play: Play it. [action] Exhaust Returning Pike: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed, you may return Returning Pike to your hand to deal +1 damage for this attack and return a card you committed to your hand instead of discarding it.

cards.name: Gloves of Thievery
cards.text:
While resolving a triggered ability on an [[Illicit]] card, you get +1 to each of your skills.
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test on an [[Illicit]] card, exhaust Gloves of Thievery: Draw 1 card or gain 1 resource. If you succeeded by 2 or more, do both instead.

cards.name: The Whispering Promise
cards.text: [reaction] After one of your card effects heals damage and/or horror from a player card: The healed card's controller gets +1 to each of their skills until the end of the round. (Limit once for each investigator per round.)

cards.name: Animal Friendship
cards.text: Parley. Choose a [[Creature]] enemy at your location or asset you control. Test [willpower] or [combat] (1). For each point you succeed by, place 1 trust token on that card. If the chosen enemy has X or more trust tokens on it, discard it. X is its health value.

cards.name: Mage Hand
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
The next action you perform this round (except move or fight) may be performed as if you were at a revealed location up to 2 connections away. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Fire Bolt
cards.text: Ignite. Fight. You may use your [willpower] or [intellect] instead of [combat] for this attack. If you fail, take 1 damage. After this test ends, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Thunderwave
cards.text: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to each enemy at the attacked enemy's location with a fight value equal to or less than your modified skill value. Move each non-[[Elite]] enemy damaged this way to a connecting location.

cards.name: Sage
cards.text:
Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
For each scenario completed in the campaign, Sage gains [wild].
If this test is successful, for every 3 [wild] icons on Sage, discover 1 clue at your location.

cards.name: Create Water
cards.text:
Uses (12 charges).
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test, spend X charges: Instead of the skill type indicated for this test, this is a conjuration skill test. Your base skill value for this test is X. Cards cannot be committed to this test.

cards.name: Faerie Fire
cards.text: [concentration] Health or Sanity. Test [willpower] or [agility] (3). If you succeed, attach Faerie Fire to your location. Attached location gets -1 shroud. Investigators at attached location get [advantage] during attacks and evasion attempts.

cards.name: Magic Missile
cards.text:
As an additional cost to play Magic Missile, spend up to 3 resources.
For each additional resource spent, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location or a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Sanctuary
cards.text: Fast. Play during any [free] window. Put Sanctuary into play under the control of an investigator at your location. Enemies cannot attack you. Forced - After you perform an attack, deal damage to an enemy, or at the end of enemy phase: Discard Sanctuary.

cards.name: Cure Wounds
cards.text: Parley. Heal 3 damage or 3 horror (or any combination thereof) from among investigators and/or [[Ally]] assets at your location. For each different card you healed, you get +1 skill value to the next skill test you perform.

cards.name: Tavern Brawler
cards.text: After you commit Tavern Brawler to a skill test, you may lose all icons on Tavern Brawler to have another card committed to this skill test gain those icons for the duration of this test. After this test ends, shuffle Tavern Brawler into your deck and gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Savage Attacker
cards.text: Max 1 committed per test. If this skill test is successful during an attack, instead of its standard damage, after this test resolves, the performing investigator attempts that test again with [advantage]. For each point they succeed by, they deal +1 damage for this attack to a max of +3 damage.

cards.name: Mirror Image
cards.text: Uses (3 charges). If Mirror Image has no charges, discard it. For each charge missing from Mirror Image, you get +1 [agility]. Forced - When an enemy attacks you: Evade. If you succeed, spend 1 charge and cancel that attack.

cards.name: Sentinel
cards.text:
[reaction] After an enemy attacks or engages an investigator: Move once towards that investigator.
[free] During any investigator's turn, except during an action, spend 1 action: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn.

cards.name: Enhance Ability
cards.text: [concentration] Health or Sanity. Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] After Enhance Ability enters play: Choose a skill and an investigator at your location. While Enhance Ability is in play, that investigator gets [advantage] on skill tests of the chosen skill.

cards.name: See Invisibility
cards.text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Exhaust See Invisibility and spend 1 charge: Investigate. If you succeed, look at the top 9 cards of the encounter deck. If you look at an enemy, discover 1 additional clue. Return all cards to the top of the encounter deck in the same order.

cards.name: Detect Thoughts
cards.text: [concentration] Sanity. [reaction] When an enemy enters your location, or vice versa, exhaust this card: Investigate. The difficulty of this test is equal to its evade. If you succeed, for the next attack or evasion attempt against it this round, investigators do not reveal chaos tokens.

cards.name: Warped Headband of Intellect
cards.text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discover 1 or more clues, exhaust Warped Headband of Intellect: Play an [[Insight]] event from your hand, reducing its cost by the number of clues you just discovered.

cards.name: Gust of Wind
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose a location up to 2 connections away from your location. Move up to 3 investigators, non-[[Elite]] enemies, or clues (or any combination thereof) from the chosen location to connecting locations.

cards.name: Misty Step
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a location up to 1 connection away from a revealed location.

cards.name: Calm Emotions
cards.text:
While Calm Emotions is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, Calm Emotions gains [willpower] [wild].
If this test is successful, ready a card you control. If Calm Emotions is committed to a skill test being performed by another investigator, that investigator also readies a card they control.

cards.name: Arcana
cards.text:
If this skill test is successful, attach Arcana to an asset you control that takes up an arcane slot. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] After you spend 1 or more uses from attached asset or exhaust it, exhaust Arcana: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: War Caster
cards.text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. You get [advantage] during [concentration] tests you perform. Do not double the negative modifier of revealed chaos tokens during a [concentration] test. [free] Exhaust War Caster: Play an event with a printed resource cost of 0.

cards.name: Speak with Dead
cards.text: Uses (5 charges). [action] Exhaust this card and spend 1 charge: Parley. Choose an enemy in the encounter discard pile. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (X). X is that enemy's fight. If you succeed, discover 3 clues at your location and shuffle that enemy into the encounter deck.

cards.name: Dungeon Delver
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. You get [advantage] during skill tests on a treachery card. [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test on a treachery or spend 1 or more actions to discard a treachery: Discover 1 clue at your location and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
Ignite. As an additional cost to play Fireball, choose your location or a connecting location. Reduce the cost to play Fireball by 1 for each flammable token on that location.
Deal 3 damage to each enemy and investigator at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Greater Restoration
cards.text: Choose 3 player cards at your location. Each chosen card heals 2 damage or 2 horror (or any combination thereof) and its controller readies a card they control.

cards.name: Glyph of Warding
cards.text:
Fast. Play when you would draw an encounter card during the mythos phase.
Instead, put Glyph of Warding into play in your play area. Search the encounter deck for a treachery card and attach it here. Shuffle the encounter deck. Group limit 2 in play.

cards.name: Necromancy of Thay
cards.text: Researched. You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat]. [action] Exhaust this card: Fight. Choose an enemy in the encounter discard pile. Add its fight value to your skill value. If you succeed, deal additional damage equal to the chosen enemy's combined damage and horror.

cards.name: Hunting Shortbow
cards.text: Uses (4 ammo). [free]: Place 1 resource on an enemy, as a bounty. (Limit once per game.) [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You may use [agility] instead of [combat] for this test. You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. You get [advantage] attacking [[Monster]] enemies.

cards.name: Skybreaker
cards.text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. You may exhaust Skybreaker to choose one -- - If you succeed, play an event from your hand reducing its cost by the amount you succeeded by. Shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it. - This attack deals +1 damage.

cards.name: Noble
cards.text: After you commit Noble to a skill test, the performing investigator gets [advantage] for this test. If this test is successful, you or the performing investigator may play a card reducing its cost by 3.

cards.name: Blooded Greataxe
cards.text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you have 3 or fewer remaining health, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may heal 1 damage. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may take 1 damage to have this attack deal +1 damage.

cards.name: Daylight
cards.text: Uses (6 charges). [concentration] Health or Sanity. Your location gets -1 shroud. [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by X or more, where X is your location's shroud, spend up to 2 charges: Discover that many clues at your location.

cards.name: The Graceful Cloth
cards.text: You get +1 [agility] and [advantage] on your [agility] tests. [reaction] After a skill test resolves with [advantage] from one of your card effects: Gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Charlatan
cards.text: After this test ends, until the end of your turn, reduce the cost of cards you play by X. X is the amount you succeeded by.

cards.name: Silver Pendant
cards.text: [free] During a skill test at your location, exhaust Silver Pendant: Name "even," "odd," or "symbol." Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag. The performing investigator gets +X skill value for this test. X is 1 more than the number of revealed chaos tokens of the named type.

cards.name: Safeguard Shield
cards.text:
You get +1 to each of your skills during the mythos phase.
[free] Take 1 damage: Choose a treachery card in your threat area. Treat that treachery's text box as if it were blank until the end of this phase.

cards.name: Deception
cards.text:
Deception can only be committed while there is an enemy at your location.
If this test is successful, gain 1 resource for each enemy at your location. If you fail, ready an enemy at your location.

cards.name: Chromatic Orb
cards.text: As an additional cost to play Chromatic Orb, choose an element (fire/lightning/cold). Fight. Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed, resolve the respective elemental effect (this card gains ignite/if this is a conjuration skill test, deal +2 damage/chill that enemy).

cards.name: Outlander
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
While the only assets you control that take up ally slots are [[Creature]] assets, they do not take up any ally slots.
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test during the mythos phase or on a treachery: Gain 1 resource or place 1 trust token on a [[Creature]] asset you control.

cards.name: Mobile
cards.text: [reaction] After you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more, exhaust Mobile: Discover 1 clue at your location.

cards.name: Hold Person
cards.text: [concentration] Sanity. Group limit 1 attached per enemy. Parley. Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, attach Hold Person to an enemy at your location. Attached enemy loses all keywords and gains: "[reaction] When you deal damage to this enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location or deal 1 additional damage."

cards.name: Entertainer
cards.text:
[reaction] After Entertainer enters play: Search your deck for up to 3 non-weakness skill cards. Attach them facedown to Entertainer. Shuffle your deck.
Attached skill cards may be committed to skill tests as if they were in your hand. If there are no skill cards attached to Entertainer, discard it.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Fight. Use your [willpower] instead of [combat] and get +3 skill value for this attack. If you succeed, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 2 damage to each enemy that shares a trait, fight, evade, or remaining health with the attacked enemy at its location and connecting locations. If this is a conjuration skill test, deal 4 damage instead. (Any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy).

cards.name: Titanstring Bow
cards.text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Use [agility] instead of [combat] and add your [combat] to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, instead of its standard damage, deal X damage to the attacked enemy. X is your [combat] (max 4). Any additional damage adds to this total.

cards.name: Shocking Grasp
cards.text: Fight. You may use your [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, that enemy cannot make attacks of opportunity for the remainder of the round. If this is a conjuration skill test, you get +2 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack.

cards.name: Shield
cards.text:
While Shield is committed to a skill test, cancel all damage and horror dealt to you.
[reaction] When you would take damage and/or horror during a skill test: Commit Shield from your hand.

cards.name: Enlarge Reduce
cards.text:
Attach Enlarge Reduce to an asset at your location. Choose one --
- Attached asset contributes its skill icons to all tests on each copy of attached asset in play.
- Attached asset gets -2 printed cost and ignores all encounter card effects.

cards.name: Criminal
cards.text:
As an additional cost to play Criminal, ready an exhausted enemy at your location.
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discover 2 clues at your location or gain 5 resources.

cards.name: Aid
cards.text:
Commit only to a skill test (of any type) being performed by another investigator at your location or a connecting location.
Aid gains [wild] equal to the skill value of your skill that matches this test's skill type. If this test is successful, you and the performing investigator each heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

cards.name: Blink
cards.text:
Uses (3 charges).
[reaction] When you would draw an encounter card during the mythos phase, spend 1 charge: Test [willpower] or [agility] (1). For each charge missing from Blink, increase the difficulty of this test by 1. If you succeed, do not draw an encounter card.

cards.name: Vampiric Touch
cards.text: [action]: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] or [agility] instead of [combat], get +X skill value, and may take 1 damage to deal +1 damage. X is the amount of damage on you. [reaction] When you deal or move damage to an enemy, exhaust Vampiric Touch: Move 1 damage or 1 horror, as damage, from you or [[Ally]] asset you control to that enemy.

cards.name: Ray of Frost
cards.text: Chill an enemy at your location and deal 1 damage to it. If it is your turn, end your turn. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Darkvision
cards.text: Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test. If the shroud of your location is... - ...higher than your base skill value, set your base skill value to the shroud of your location for this test. Draw 1 card. - ...equal to or lower than your base skill value, you get [advantage] for this skill test. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ritual Caster
cards.text:
If this test is successful, attach Ritual Caster to an asset you control.
1 doom on attached asset does not count towards the agenda's doom threshold.

cards.name: The Haunted One
cards.text:
After you commit The Haunted One to a skill test, you may shuffle a weakness from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, this test automatically succeeds.
For each encounter card in your threat area, The Haunted One gains [wild].

cards.name: Urchin
cards.text: If this test is successful, you may ready an enemy at your location to immediately take 2 actions as if it were your turn (these actions do not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn). (Max once per enemy per round.)

cards.name: History
cards.text:
For each clue you have (to a max of 3), History gains [wild].
After this test ends, you may give up to 3 clues you have to the performing investigator, or vice versa.

cards.name: Tough
cards.text:
Group limit 1 in play.
[reaction] After an enemy readies at your location: Deal 1 damage to that enemy and draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Elemental Adept
cards.text: If this test is successful, for each different class among cards you control draw 1 card.

cards.name: Minor Illusion
cards.text: Investigate. If you succeed, attach Minor Illusion to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [free] Discard Minor Illusion: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at attached location. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

cards.name: Thaumaturgy
cards.text:
Limit 1 per deck.
Draw 2 cards.
[reaction] When you would shuffle your discard pile into your deck, if Thaumaturgy is in your discard pile: Shuffle only the portion of the discard pile on top of this card into your deck. Remove this card from the game.

cards.name: Heroism
cards.text:
Heroism may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[free] Take 1 damage and 1 horror: Either engage an enemy at your location or discard a [[Terror]] card in your threat area.

cards.name: Invisibility
cards.text: Uses (4 secrets). [concentration] Health. [free] Spend 1 secret: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you. [free] Spend 1 secret: Add your location's shroud value to your skill value for this test.

cards.name: Spike Growth
cards.text: [concentration] Health. Fast. Play during any [free] window. Attach to your location. Forced - When an enemy enters, leaves, or readies at attached location: Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

cards.name: Resilient
cards.text:
Fast. Play after a card enters your discard pile.
Add that card to your hand.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.text:
Myriad. Fast. Play during any [free] window.
Flip a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location facedown discarding all tokens and attachments. While facedown, treat it as a Sheep enemy with 1 fight, 1 health, 1 evade, 1 damage, and the [[Creature]] trait. After an investigator defeats Sheep, they draw the facedown enemy.

cards.name: Find Familiar
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. Parley. Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Find Familiar and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Find Familiar or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Familiar Cat
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional hand slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Cat: You get +1 [intellect] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

cards.name: Familiar Crab
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional accessory slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Crab: You get +1 [combat] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

cards.name: Familiar Frog
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional ally slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Frog: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

cards.name: Familiar Rat
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional body slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Rat: You get +1 [intellect] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.

cards.name: Familiar Raven
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional arcane slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Raven: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

cards.name: Familiar Spider
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Familiar).
You have 1 additional tarot slot.
[free] Exhaust Familiar Spider: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.

cards.name: Web
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to your location or a connecting location, and place 2 damage on it, as flammable tokens. If there are no flammable tokens at attached location, discard Web.
Enemies at attached location get -1 evade for each flammable token at this location.

cards.name: Darkness
cards.text: [concentration] Health or Sanity. Fast. Play during any [free] window. Attach to your location. Disengage each enemy from investigators at attached location. Attached location gets +2 shroud. Non-[[Elite]] enemies at attached location cannot engage or be engaged.

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Animate Dead and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Animate Dead or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Skeleton
cards.text:
Bonded (Animate Dead).
[reaction] After a [curse] token is revealed at your location, exhaust Skeleton: Draw 1 card, gain 2 resources, or if this is during a skill test, reduce its difficulty by 2.
[reaction] After 1 or more [curse] tokens are added to the chaos bag: Ready Skeleton.

cards.name: Zombie
cards.text: Bonded (Animate Dead). Investigators at your location may treat "[bless]" on their player cards as "[bless] and/or [curse]" instead. You may choose to resolve a [curse] token instead of the other revealed token for [advantage] and [disadvantage] ignoring any forced choice.

cards.name: Dimension Door
cards.text: Choose a revealed location. Move any number of investigators to that location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

cards.name: Conjure Elemental
cards.text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Conjure Elemental and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Conjure Elemental or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Elemental).
You get +1 skill value while attempting to evade.
[reaction] After you move to a location: Draw 1 card or gain 1 resource. (Limit 1 card and 2 resources per round.)
[action] Exhaust Air Elemental: Move to a revealed location up to 3 connections away from your location.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Elemental).
You get +1 skill value while fighting.
[reaction] When your turn begins: Place 1 damage on any  two locations, as flammable tokens.
[reaction] When you deal damage, exhaust Fire Elemental: This damage gains ignite.

cards.name: Water Elemental
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Elemental).
You get +2 skill value during conjuration skill tests.
[reaction] After a conjuration skill test you perform ends, exhaust Water Elemental: Place 2 charges on assets you control, or heal 1 damage and 1 horror from you or an asset you control.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Elemental).
You get +1 skill value while investigating.
[reaction] When you discover 1 or more clues from any location, exhaust 2 assets you control: Discover 1 additional clue.

cards.name: Planar Ally
cards.text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Planar Ally and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Planar Ally or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Deva
cards.text:
Bonded (Planar Ally). Uses (3 divinity).
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [combat].
[reaction] When an investigator would draw the top card of the encounter deck, spend 1 divinity: They search the top 9 cards of their deck for a card and draw it instead. Shuffle their deck.

cards.name: Cambion
cards.text:
Bonded (Planar Ally). Uses (3 deals).
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat].
[free] Spend 1 deal and X resources: Defeat a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location with X or fewer remaining health. If the defeated enemy enters the victory display, gain 3 resources.

cards.name: Djinni
cards.text: Bonded (Planar Ally). Uses (3 wishes). You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility]. [free] Spend 1 wish: You get a modified [advantage] on all tests you perform this round. This modified [advantage] reveals 2 additional tokens instead of 1, choosing and canceling 2 tokens with the lowest modifiers, ignoring any effect that forces you to resolve a [auto_fail] token.

cards.name: Disguise Self
cards.text: Evade. You may use your [willpower] or [agility] and get +1 skill value for this test. If you succeed, put Disguise Self into play in your play area. You get +1 skill value while investigating, parleying, or attempting to evade. Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating, parleying, or attempting to evade: Discard Disguise Self.

cards.name: Springstep Boots
cards.text:
Limit 1 [[Footwear]] per investigator.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you exhaust a card at your location, exhaust Springstep Boots: Move to a connecting location.

cards.name: Assassin's Touch
cards.text: Fast. [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Assassin's Touch: Deal 1 damage to that enemy. [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack automatically succeeds if the attacked enemy has exactly 1 remaining health.

cards.name: Sword of Justice
cards.text: [reaction] After you engage an enemy: Add 1 [bless] token to or remove 1 [curse] token from the chaos bag [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. After this test ends, you may exhaust Sword of Justice to add 1 [bless] token to the chaos bag for each point you succeeded or failed by (max 3).

cards.name: Everburn Blade
cards.text: Ignite. Uses (4 charges). Replenish 2 of these charges at the start of each round. [action]: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack. When you would fail this skill test, spend up to 3 charges. For each charge spent, you get +1 skill value or deal +1 damage for this attack.

cards.name: The Spellsparkler
cards.text:
You get +1 skill value during skill tests on [[Spell]] cards.
[reaction] After you play a [[Spell]] card or commit a [[Spell]] skill card: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[reaction] When a [[Spell]] card at your location would exhaust: Exhaust The Spellsparkler instead. Costs that require a card to be exhausted are considered paid.

cards.name: Mourning Frost
cards.text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When you chill an enemy, except via Mourning Frost: Chill that enemy again.
[reaction] When a chilled enemy is defeated at your location, exhaust this card: For each <fro> token on that enemy, discover 1 clue at your location or gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Dual Wielder
cards.text: [reaction] After you spend uses from an asset held in one of your hand slots: Place that many uses on an asset held in another one of your hand slots. You may both spend and place uses on an asset if it takes up 2 hand slots. (Limit once for each of your hand slots per round.)

cards.name: Phalar Aluve
cards.text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] Exhaust Phalar Aluve: Parley. Search your bonded cards for Sing or Shriek and put it into play in your play area.

cards.name: Durable
cards.text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] After 1 or more cards enter your deck, exhaust Durable: Choose one --
- Heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
- Take a basic or play action.

cards.name: Soldier
cards.text: If this test is successful, choose a [[Spirit]] or [[Tactic]] card from your hand or discard pile. Play it (paying its cost) or return it to your hand.

cards.name: Inspiration
cards.text: Choose a player card attachment that you own. Return it to your hand.

cards.name: Sleet Storm
cards.text: [concentration] Health or Sanity. Chill each enemy at your location twice. Attach Sleet Storm to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [reaction] When your turn begins: Chill each enemy at attached location.

cards.name: Sing
cards.text: Bonded (Phalar Aluve). [reaction] When an investigator at your location performs a fight action: They get +2 skill value for that attack. Forced - After Phalar Aluve or Sing leaves play, or at the end of the round: Set Sing aside, out of play.

cards.name: Shriek
cards.text: Bonded (Phalar Aluve). [reaction] When an investigator at your location performs a fight action: They deal +1 damage for that attack. Forced - After Phalar Aluve or Shriek leaves play, or at the end of the round: Set Shriek aside, out of play.

cards.name: Command
cards.text: Parley. Choose an enemy in play and test any skill (X). X is that enemy's fight value. If you succeed, the next time that enemy attacks, cancel that attack and choose one -- - Move that enemy to a connecting location. - Discover 1 clue at its location. - Automatically evade that enemy.

cards.name: Owlbear Cub
cards.text:
While your base [combat] is 3 or lower, you get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After an enemy is defeated at your location, exhaust Owlbear Cub: Heal damage and horror from Owlbear Cub equal to that enemy's damage and horror value.

cards.name: Psychic Spark
cards.text: [reaction] After you play an event: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a copy of that event. You may exhaust Psychic Spark to draw it. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Diadem of Arcane Synergy
cards.text:
You get +1 skill value during skill tests on arcane slot assets for each of your filled hand slots, and vice versa.
[reaction] When you reveal a chaos token, exhaust Diadem of Arcane Synergy: Search the chaos bag for any number of non-[elder_sign] chaos tokens with a combined modifier equal to the revealed token and reveal them, instead.

cards.name: Luminous Armor
cards.text: [reaction] When you deal any amount of damage to an enemy: Place that many resources (from the token pool) on that enemy's location, as radiating orbs. [reaction] When an investigator takes damage and/or horror, remove any number of radiating orbs from their location: For each radiating orb removed, cancel 1 of that damage or horror.

cards.name: Gloves of Belligerent Skies
cards.text:
[reaction] After this card enters play: Name an encounter set. Reduce the difficulty of skill tests on or against enemies and treacheries of the named set by 2.
[reaction] When you draw a non-[[Elite]] enemy or treachery of the named set, discard Gloves of Belligerent Skies: Cancel all of that card's effects and discard it.

cards.name: Disintegrating Night Walkers
cards.text:
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters your location, or vice versa, exhaust Disintegrating Night Walkers: That enemy gains aloof until the end of this phase.

cards.name: Gloves of the Growling Underdog
cards.text: While there are 2 or more encounter cards in your threat area, you get [advantage] on skill tests. [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Gloves of the Growling Underdog: Gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Ring of Protection
cards.text: Exceptional. Seal (any non-symbol token). Forced - After this card enters play: Add a non-symbol chaos token to the chaos bag with a modifier 1 greater than the sealed token. When this card leaves play, search the chaos bag and/or cards in play for the added token and return it to the token pool.

cards.name: Smuggler's Ring
cards.text: [reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location: Gain 1 resource. [free] If your location has exactly 1 clue on it, exhaust Smuggler's Ring and spend 2 resources: Investigate. If you succeed, gain 2 resources.

cards.name: Ring of Flinging
cards.text:
Exceptional. Fast.
[reaction] When you discard this card from your hand or play area: Return it to your hand. (Max once per round.)
[reaction] When an asset leaves your play area during or as a cost to initiate an attack you are performing: Deal 1 damage to the attacked enemy. (Max once per round.)

cards.name: Entangle
cards.text: Evade. Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this test. After this test ends, attach Entangle to your location. Forced - When an investigator would resolve the ignite keyword at attached location, discard Entangle: Place 2 damage on attached location, as flammable tokens. While resolving the ignite keyword at attached location, set the evade value of each enemy to 0.

cards.name: Hellish Rebuke
cards.text:
Ignite. Uses (3 charges).
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled, spend 1 charge: Deal 1 damage to that enemy. While resolving the ignite keyword, set that enemy's evade to 0.

cards.name: The Protecty Sparkswall
cards.text:
[reaction] After you play an [[Augury]] card or commit an [[Augury]] skill: Choose the encounter deck or any player deck. Play with the top card of that deck revealed until the end of the round. 
[free] Exhaust this card: Choose an [[Augury]] card in your discard pile. Shuffle it into your deck.

cards.name: Strength
cards.text:
Choose a skill ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]).
Each investigator searches the top 9 cards of their deck for a card with a skill icon matching the chosen option (not counting [wild] icons), draws it, and shuffles their deck.

cards.name: Acrobatics
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Draw 3 cards. Place 2 cards from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck, in any order.

cards.name: Barkskin
cards.text:
Attach Barkskin to you. Limit 1 per investigator.
While you have 3 or fewer remaining health, you get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility]. While you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity, you get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you play or commit a [[Desperate]] card, exhaust Barkskin: Shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Knock
cards.text: Choose one -- - Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, draw 3 cards. - Discard an [[Obstacle]] treachery attached to your location.

cards.name: Curious Book
cards.text:
Uses (5 secrets). If Curious Book has no secrets, discard it.
You may spend secrets on Curious Book as resources to pay for events played by any investigator at your location. If the event is a [[Spell]] and at least 1 secret was spent, that investigator gains 1 resource.

cards.name: Fey Ancestry
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck.
You have 2 additional ally slots.
While Fey Ancestry has fewer than 3 charges on it, these slots can only be used to hold [[Summon]] assets.
[free] Exhaust Fey Ancestry: Move 1 charge from another asset you control onto Fey Ancestry.

cards.name: Draconic Ancestry
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck.
Each of your ally slots can hold up to 2 [[Ally]] assets that share 1 or more non-[[Ally]] traits.
[reaction] When you play an [[Ally]] asset, if it shares a non-[[Ally]] trait with a card you control: Reduce its resource cost by 1.

cards.name: Zhentarim Network
cards.text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. You have 2 additional ally slots, which can only be used to hold [[Criminal]] assets. Forced - When you take damage and/or horror, if you control any [[Criminal]] assets: Either spend 1 resource or assign at least 1 of that damage or horror to a [[Criminal]] asset you control.

cards.name: Halfling Luck
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck.
[reaction] When you spend 2 or more resources to trigger an ability or as an additional cost: Gain 1 resource.
[reaction] When you reveal a [auto_fail] token, spend 3 resources and exhaust Halfling Luck: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token.

cards.name: Divine Favor
cards.text:
Uses (3 charges). Remove 1 charge from Divine Favor at the start of each of your turns. If Divine Favor has no charges, it gains the text:
"[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag, discard Divine Favor: Search the chaos bag for an [elder_sign] token and resolve it instead."

cards.name: Astral Knowledge
cards.text: Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck. Forced - After your turn begins: Choose a skill. Until the start of your next turn, you get +1 to that skill. [reaction] When an investigator initiates a skill test of your chosen skill, exhaust Astral Knowledge: They get [advantage] for this test.

cards.name: Hellish Resistance
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck.
Ignore damage dealt to you by the ignite keyword.
[reaction] When you would deal damage with a [survivor] card: That card gains ignite until the end of the phase. If it already has ignite, place 1 damage on your location, as a flammable token.

cards.name: Burning Hands
cards.text: Ignite. Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat] and deal +1 damage. If this attack fails, you may spend 1 charge to deal 1 damage to the attacked enemy. This action is considered "unarmed".

cards.name: The Deathstalker Mantle
cards.text:
You cannot purchase this card unless you have a copy of The Dark Urge.
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust this card: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a connecting location.

cards.name: Human Versatility
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 [[Racial Feature]] per deck.
Your deck size is increased by 5.
[reaction] Before drawing your opening hand: Attach 5 non-weakness Neutral events and skills from your deck facedown to this card.
