Until the end of the round, enemies cannot attack that investigator.

cards.name: Convergent Future
cards.text: For each outcome on Convergent Future, reduce the difficulty of skill tests you perform by 1. Forced - After you fail a skill test: Place X resources on here, as outcomes. X is your modified skill value. Forced - After you succeed at a skill test: Remove all outcomes from Convergent Future.

cards.name: Chronal Shift
cards.text:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect or keyword on a card that triggers when/after your turn begins, or that triggers at the start/end of your turn/the phase/the round.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.

cards.name: Rope Trick
cards.text:
Expire 3. Fast. Play during any [free] window.
Put Rope Trick into play and choose a non-weakness card you control. Set the chosen card aside, out of play, keeping all tokens and attachments. When Rope Trick leaves play, return the chosen card back into play.
[free]: Discard Rope Trick.

cards.name: Fury of the Small
cards.text:
Reduce the cost of cards you play that cost 2 or less by 1.
Increase the cost of cards you play that cost 3 or more by 1.

cards.name: Sign of Ill Omen
cards.text: If this test is successful, gain 1 resource for each doom in play. If this test fails, lose 1 resource for each doom in play.

cards.name: Lunar Boons
cards.text: Forced - At the start of the round: If the remainder of all doom in play divided by 3 is... -...0, each location gets +1 shroud for this round. -...1, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. -...2, each location gets -1 shroud for this round.

cards.name: Twilight Shroud
cards.text:
You may commit Twilight Shroud to any type of skill test.
Twilight Shroud gains [wild] icons equal to your location's shroud value. If this test is successful and on a treachery, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ceremony
cards.text:
Seal (up to 3 [bless] from the token pool or chaos bag). If Ceremony has no tokens sealed on it, discard it.
[reaction] When you reveal a chaos token, exhaust Ceremony and release a [bless] token sealed on it: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token.

cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.text: Remove a token on a card you control. Then, place a token from the token pool on a card you control. This effect cannot remove or place clues or chaos tokens.

cards.name: Fathomless Plunge
cards.text: Choose 2 numbers. Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. One at a time, play or draw each revealed card with a printed resource cost equal to either of the chosen numbers. Discard the rest of the revealed cards.

cards.name: Zone of Truth
cards.text: Fast. Play when an enemy readies at or enters your location. Attach to your location. [reaction] After an enemy readies at or enters attached location: Parley. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (2). If you succeed, discover 1 clue at attached location or a connecting location.

cards.name: Dispel Magic
cards.text: Shuffle X treachery and/or [[Spell]] cards at your location, or not at any location, into their decks.

cards.name: Reckless Abandon
cards.text: Fast. Play after your turn begins. You may take 2 additional actions this turn. For this round, you get [disadvantage] on your skill tests until you fail a skill test.

cards.name: Rallying Cry
cards.text: [reaction] When one of your card effects heals damage and/or horror from a card you control, exhaust Rallying Cry: Heal that much damage and horror from another player card at your location as well.

cards.name: Banneret
cards.text: [reaction] After you deal damage to an enemy, exhaust Banneret: Draw 1 card or ready a card you control.

cards.name: Ghostly Gaze
cards.text: Investigate. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, for each point you succeed by, reveal the top card of your deck. Swap any number of cards from your hand with any number of revealed cards. Then, return the remaining cards to the top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Eldritch Sight
cards.text: [free] Exhaust Eldritch Sight: Discover 1 clue at your location. Forced - At the end of the round, if you exhausted Eldritch Sight this round: Place 1 of your clues on your location.

cards.name: Linguist
cards.text: [reaction] When you discover 1 or more clues by an event or an investigate ability on an event, exhaust Linguist: Discover 1 additional clue.

cards.name: Bottled Respite
cards.text:
[reaction] After you evade an enemy: Put Bottled Respite into play from your hand, or discard it from play to choose one --
- Heal 2 damage or 2 horror.
- Draw 2 cards.
- Gain 3 resources.

cards.name: Druidcraft
cards.text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Druidcraft to any type of test.
If this test fails, the performing investigator heals 2 damage or 2 horror, or any combination thereof.

cards.name: Creative Crescendo
cards.text:
Myriad.
If this test is successful, attach Creative Crescendo to the performing investigator. They choose a skill they have not chosen this game. While Creative Crescendo is attached to them, they get +1 to the chosen skill.

cards.name: Agent of Order
cards.text:
Fast. Play after you discover 2 or more clues or deal 2 or more damage to an enemy.
If you discovered clues, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.
If you dealt damage to an enemy, discover 2 clues at your location.

cards.name: Observant
cards.text: [reaction] After you resolve an ability on an asset when or after it enters play, exhaust Observant: Resolve its effects again.

cards.name: Chef
cards.text:
After you commit Chef to a skill test, each investigator at your location gains 1 resource.
If this test is successful, each investigator that committed a card to this test gains 1 resource.

cards.name: Storm Aura
cards.text: Forced - After Storm Aura enters play: Search your bonded cards for Desert, Sea, or Tundra and put it into play. When Storm Aura leaves play, find each of those assets and set them aside, out of play. [reaction] When your turn begins: Search your bonded cards for Desert, Sea, or Tundra and swap it with one in your play area.

cards.name: Desert
cards.text:
Bonded (Storm Aura). Ignite.
[reaction] After Desert enters play: If it swapped this round with...
- ...Sea, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
- ...Tundra, place 1 damage on your location and each connecting location, as flammable tokens.

cards.name: Sea
cards.text:
Bonded (Storm Aura).
[reaction] After Sea enters play: If it swapped this round with...
-...Desert, replenish 1 use on a card you control.
-...Tundra, remove 1 non-chaos token from a card you control.

cards.name: Tundra
cards.text:
Bonded (Storm Aura).
[reaction] After Tundra enters play: If it swapped this round with...
-...Desert, chill an enemy at your location.
-...Sea, seal a non-[auto_fail] token from the chaos bag on a card you control. At the end of the round, release it.

cards.name: Spare the Dying
cards.text:
Fast. Play when an asset at your location leaves play.
Gain X resources, where X is the total amount of damage and horror on that asset. Shuffle that asset into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Inheritor
cards.text:
Search your deck, hand, and discard pile for a copy of Inheritor. Put this card into play under your control and its copy under the control of another investigator. Group limit 2 in play.
You share your available hand, ally, arcane, tarot, body, and accessory slots with Inheritor's other controller.

cards.name: Magical Tinkering
cards.text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
You may trigger abilities on [[Tool]] or [[Science]] cards in your hand by revealing them from your hand. You may spend resources from your resource pool as uses on those cards. You may exhaust Magical Tinkering as if you were to exhaust those cards.

cards.name: Spiritual Focus
cards.text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Spiritual Focus: Ready a card you control that shares a [[Trait]] with the committed card.

cards.name: Kinetic Jaunt
cards.text:
After you commit Kinetic Jaunt to a skill test, you may move to a connecting location, or if this test is on an asset, replenish 1 of its uses.
If you succeed by 2 or more, return Kinetic Jaunt to your hand at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Dice Set
cards.text: [reaction] When your turn begins: Reveal 3 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. If the number of revealed tokens of the same type (odd, even, or symbol) is... -...2 or more, gain 1 resource. -...3 or more, take an action.

cards.name: Otherworldly Patron
cards.text: Play Otherworldly Patron as an exact copy of any event in any investigator's discard pile. Then, place 1 doom on a card you control.

cards.name: Inspiring Leader
cards.text: Parley. Test [willpower] (0). For each point you succeed by, ready a card at your location (to a maximum of 6).

cards.name: Faerie Toast
cards.text:
Fast. Play after you trigger an ability on an asset you control.
Resolve that ability again. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Distort Value
cards.text:
Fast. Play when you play a card.
Instead of paying resources to play that card, return cards you control to your hand with a combined resource cost equal to the card being played. Its resource cost is considered paid.

cards.name: Illusory Script
cards.text:
Fast. Play after you successfully investigate by 2 or more.
Discover 1 clue at your location.

cards.name: Knight
cards.text:
Fast. Play after your investigator or assets you control are assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Mastermind
cards.text: [reaction] When an investigator at your location would perform a skill test, exhaust Mastermind: Choose a different investigator at your location to perform that test instead. The chosen investigator resolves all effects of this test.

cards.name: Archaeologist
cards.text: If this test is successful, after it resolves, take an investigate action. (Max once per round.)

cards.name: Smuggler
cards.text: If this test is successful, for every 2 points you succeeded by, return a card committed to this test not named Smuggler to its owner's hand (max 3).

cards.name: Hermit
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck.
Increase the difficulty of skill tests you perform while parleying by 2.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 3.

cards.name: Catnap
cards.text:
As an additional cost to play Catnap, each investigator at your location may spend an action.
Each investigator that spent an action doubles their resources and draws 1 card. Remove Catnap from the game.

cards.name: Keen Mind
cards.text:
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Instead of the skill type indicated for this test ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]), this is a cerebral skill test. Your base skill value for this test is equal to the number of other cards in your hand (to a max value equal to your max hand size).

cards.name: Quicksmithing
cards.text:
Fast. Play after an asset you control that takes up 1 or more slots leaves play.
Play an asset from your hand that shares 1 or more slots with the asset that left play.

cards.name: Grappler
cards.text: While there is only one enemy engaged with you, other investigators get [advantage] attacking that enemy. [free] During your turn, exhaust Grappler: Choose an enemy at your location or a connecting location. Test [combat] (X). X is the chosen's fight value. If you succeed, move to its location and engage that enemy.

cards.name: Echo Avatar
cards.text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. When Echo Avatar's location would leave play, move it to your play area.
[reaction] When your turn begins: If Echo Avatar is in your play area, place it at your location. Otherwise, move it once in any direction.
[free] Exhaust Echo Avatar: You swap places with it.

cards.name: Prodigy
cards.text: Permanent. You get +1 deck size. [reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for a [[Talent]] asset and play it (paying its cost). You may draw 1 less card for your opening hand to reduce its cost to 0. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Ascendant Aspect
cards.text: Set exactly 5 skills aside from among all investigator discard piles, out of play. While set aside, any investigator may commit any of those cards as if they were in their hand. At the start of the next investigation phase, shuffle those cards still set aside into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Arcane Firearm
cards.text: Uses (4 ammo). [free]: Attach an event with a fight ability from your hand to Arcane Firearm. Limit 2 events attached. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Resolve a fight ability on an event attached to Arcane Firearm with [advantage], ignoring all costs. Do not discard it after resolving it.

cards.name: Navigator's Tools
cards.text:
Uses (4 supplies).
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility] for each location you have been to this round.
[reaction] When you would move, spend 1 supply: Look at the revealed side of each connecting location. You may exhaust Navigator's Tools to draw 1 card.

cards.name: Amulet of the Planes
cards.text:
[reaction] After you play a fast card, exhaust Amulet of the Planes: Move to any revealed location.
[reaction] When you resign or the game ends, if this card is in play: Investigators may play any scenario not part of this campaign as a side-story. All experience costs to play a side-story are considered paid.

cards.name: Hand of Vecna
cards.text:
Exceptional. Uses (8 charges). Cannot leave play.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token during a skill test on a [[Spell]] card except this card, spend X charges: Instead, search the chaos bag for any token and reveal it. Test [willpower] (5). This test gets -X difficulty. If you fail, place 1 doom on the current agenda.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.text: Class. Permanent. [reaction] Infuse Item -- After an [[Item]] asset enters play at your location, exhaust Artificer: Place 1 use on that asset or gain 1 resource. Forced - When a card bonded to Artificer leaves play: Set it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.text: Subclass. Permanent. Alchemical Savant -- Infuse Item places 2 uses instead of 1 on [[Science]], [[Tool]], and alchemy keyword assets. [reaction] Chemical Mastery -- When you spend 1 or more tokens from an [[Science]], [[Tool]], or alchemy keyword asset, spend 1 additional token: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.text: Subclass. Permanent. Arcane Armor -- [[Armor]] assets you control may take up an arcane slot instead of a body slot. [action]: Armor Model -- Find all cards bonded to Artificer and set them aside, out of play. Search your bonded cards for Guardian or Infiltrator and put it into play.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.text: Subclass. Permanent. Infuse Item places 2 uses instead of 1 on [[Firearm]] assets and can trigger on them at connecting locations. [reaction] Explosive Cannon -- When your turn begins: Search your bonded cards for Eldritch Cannon and put it into play at your location or a connecting location.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.text: Subclass. Permanent. Steel Defender -- Exhausted [[Item]] assets you control take 1 fewer damage or horror from each source except itself. [free] Exhaust an [[Item]] asset you control: You get +1 skill value for this test.

cards.name: Guardian
cards.text:
Bonded (Artificer). Uses (1 supply).
[reaction] When you perform a successful basic attack, spend 1 supply: Deal +1 damage for that attack.
Guardian may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location. As an additional cost to do so, spend 1 supply.

cards.name: Infiltrator
cards.text:
Bonded (Artificer). Uses (1 supply).
[reaction] After you enter a location, spend 1 supply: Take an action without provoking attacks of opportunity.
[free] Spend 1 supply: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a connecting location.

cards.name: Eldritch Cannon
cards.text: Bonded (Artificer). Uses (1 charge). [free] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack targets an enemy at Eldritch Cannon's location or a connecting location, and ignores the aloof keyword. Add your [intellect] to skill value for this attack. [action]: Set Eldritch Cannon aside, out of play.

cards.name: Right Tool for the Job
cards.text:
Artificer deck only.
Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Tool]] asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. If you did not add a card to your hand, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

cards.name: Enhanced Defense
cards.text: Artificer deck only. Attach to an [[Item]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Attached asset gets +1 health and +1 sanity. Direct damage and direct horror may be assigned to attached asset. Attached asset's controller does not perform [concentration] tests.

cards.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
cards.text:
Artificer deck only.
Immediately mark 4 checkboxes on an upgrade sheet for a customizable [[Item]] card you own, even if it is not in play. Checkboxes marked this way ignore checkbox maximums. At the end of the game, unmark those checkboxes. Remove Enhanced Arcane Focus from the game.

cards.name: Flash of Genius
cards.text:
Artificer deck only.
Fast. Play after you succeed at a skill test on an [[Item]] asset.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

cards.name: Radiant Weapon
cards.text: Artificer deck only. Uses (4 charges). Attach to a [[Weapon]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location. It gains the [[Relic]] trait. [reaction] When you perform an attack using attached asset, exhaust this card: You deal +1 damage for this attack. You may spend 1 charge to give [advantage] on all attacks against that enemy this round.

cards.name: Replicate Magic Item
cards.text:
Artificer deck only.
Choose a level 0-5 [[Item]] asset from your collection. Spend resources equal to its level to put it into play, setting any relevant bonded cards and upgrade sheets aside. At the end of the game, return it to your collection. Remove Replicate Magic Item from the game.

cards.name: Bag of Holding
cards.text:
[free] Exhaust Bag of Holding: Choose an investigator at your location to search the top 9 cards of their deck for a non-weakness [[Item]] asset and attach it here facedown. Shuffle their deck.
Cards attached to this card may be played as if they were in the hand of any investigator at its location.

cards.name: Ring of Three Wishes
cards.text:
Fast. Uses (3 wishes). If Ring of Three Wishes has no wishes, remove it from the game.
[free] During a skill test on an encounter card, spend 1 wish: Gain resources equal to the difficulty of this test. You automatically succeed this test.

cards.name: Ring of Spell Storing
cards.text:
Uses (5 charges).
[free] Spend 1 charge: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] card from your hand to this card. Then, draw 1 card.
Investigators at your location may play or commit cards attached to Ring of Spell Storing as if they were in their hand.

cards.name: Decanter of Endless Water
cards.text:
[free] Remove any token represented by a resource token from a card you control: Exhaust this card.
[reaction] After Decanter of Endless Water is exhausted: Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.
[reaction] After a conjuration skill test you perform ends: Ready Decanter of Endless Water.

cards.name: Poisoner's Kit
cards.text:
Uses (4 supplies).
[reaction] After you evade an enemy or deal damage to it, spend 1 supply: Place 1 resource on it, as a poison.
[reaction] When an enemy takes damage: It takes +X damage. X is the number of poisons on it.

cards.name: Cloak of Protection
cards.text:
[free] Exhaust Cloak of Protection: Treat each [auto_fail] token you reveal during this skill test as an [elder_sign].
[reaction] After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Cloak of Protection: Ready it.

cards.name: Iron Flask
cards.text:
[reaction] After Iron Flask enters play: Search your collection for a non-weakness, non-[[Elite]] enemy and attach it facedown here. (Max once per game.)
[reaction] When you would draw an encounter card: Spawn an enemy attached to Iron Flask at your location instead.

cards.name: Pearl of Power
cards.text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, exhaust Pearl of Power: Resolve the effects of the successful test increasing the value of each effect by 1.

cards.name: Immovable Rod
cards.text:
This card does not ready during the upkeep phase.
[action]: Ready Immovable Rod.
[free] Exhaust Immovable Rod: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. It cannot move or ready and set its evade to 0 until Immovable Rod readies or leaves play.

cards.name: Herbalism Kit
cards.text:
Uses (4 supplies). If Herbalism Kit has no supplies on it, discard it.
[reaction] When an investigator at your location initiates a skill test, spend 1 supply: This test gets -2 difficulty. If that test succeeds, the performing investigator heals 1 damage or 1 horror.

cards.name: Find Steed
cards.text: Limit 1 per investigator. Parley. Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Find Steed and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Find Steed or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Conjure Animals
cards.text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
Search your bonded cards for a card bonded to Conjure Animals and put it into play. Put this card into play in your play area. When Conjure Animals or any cards bonded to it leaves your play area, discard this card and set any cards bonded to it aside, out of play.

cards.name: Primal Bond
cards.text:
If this test is successful, attach Primal Bond to a [[Creature]] asset you control. Place 3 trust tokens on Primal Bond.
Trust tokens on Primal Bond may be spent as if they were on the attached asset. If there are no trust tokens on Primal Bond, discard it.

cards.name: Warhorse
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After you engage an enemy, exhaust Warhorse: Deal 1 damage to that enemy or heal 1 damage. You may spend 1 trust token to do both.

cards.name: Camel
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you draw 1 or more cards during the investigation phase, exhaust Camel: Play one of those cards. You may spend 1 trust token to reduce its resource cost by 2.

cards.name: Elk
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, exhaust Elk: Gain 1 resource. You may spend 1 trust token to gain resources equal to the amount you succeed by instead (to a max of 3).

cards.name: Elephant
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After you cancel or ignore a card effect or game effect, or discard an encounter card from play or the encounter deck, exhaust Elephant: Draw 1 card. You may spend 1 trust token to heal 1 horror.

cards.name: Mastiff
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
While Mastiff is exhausted, skill tests you perform get -1 difficulty.
[reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Mastiff: Take a basic action. You may spend 1 trust token to take any action instead.

cards.name: Hippogriff
cards.text:
Bonded (Find Steed).
[reaction] After Hippogriff enters play: Choose a skill. You get +1 to that skill while Hippogriff is in play.
[reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Hippogriff: Move to a connecting location or ready a card you control. You may spend 1 trust token to do both.

cards.name: Lion
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Animals).
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Lion: Place 1 trust token on it.
[free] Spend 2 trust tokens: Test [willpower] or [combat] (3). If you succeed, deal 1 damage to and move each non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to a connecting location.

cards.name: Giant Octopus
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Animals).
[reaction] After you discover 1 or more clues, exhaust Giant Octopus: Place 1 trust token on it.
[reaction] After a card is committed to a skill test at your location, spend 2 trust tokens: Return it to its owner's hand after this test ends.

cards.name: Giant Boar
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Animals).
[reaction] After you gain resources via player card effect, exhaust Giant Boar: Place 1 trust token on it.
[free] Spend 2 trust tokens: Take an action. Reduce the resource cost of triggered abilities the first time you trigger them during that action by 1.

cards.name: Giant Constrictor
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Animals).
[reaction] After you reveal a symbol token during a skill test, exhaust Giant Constrictor: Place 1 trust token on it.
[free] Spend 2 trust tokens: Treat the scenario reference card as if it were blank for this phase.

cards.name: Giant Eagle
cards.text:
Bonded (Conjure Animals).
[reaction] After 1 or more cards leave your discard pile, exhaust Giant Eagle: Place 1 trust token on it.
[free] Spend 2 trust tokens: Choose 3 cards from your discard pile. Randomly shuffle one of them into your deck and return another one to your hand.

cards.name: Rhinoceros
cards.text: Bonded (Conjure Animals). [reaction] After damage and/or horror is assigned to Rhinoceros, exhaust it: Place 1 trust token on it. [action] Spend 2 trust tokens: Move. Move up to 3 times. Deal 1 damage to each enemy you engage and exhaust them during this movement.

cards.name: Charm Person
cards.text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [willpower] (0). For each point you succeed by, draw 1 card (to a maximum of 5 cards). If you fail, that enemy attacks you.

cards.name: Gift of Gab
cards.text: If this test is successful, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Discard each looked-at weakness. Place the rest of the cards on the top or bottom of your deck, in any order. If this skill test is during a parley action, look at 3 additional cards.

cards.name: Feylost
cards.text: After this test ends, add Feylost to your play area as an asset with the text: "Feylost loses its skill icon matching the skill test it was committed to after that test ends. You may commit this card to eligible skill tests performed at your location. Forced - If Feylost has no skill icons: Discard it."

cards.name: Cloistered Scholar
cards.text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose a scenario card in play. Resolve an "[action]" ability on that card without spending an action. Then, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cohort of Chaos
cards.text:
For each point of physical trauma and mental trauma that you have, Cohort of Chaos gains [wild].
If an [elder_sign] token is revealed during this test, you may remove 1 point of physical or mental trauma that you have after this test ends.

cards.name: Eye of Vecna
cards.text: Fast. Seal (any except [elder_sign] or [auto_fail]). Forced - After Eye of Vecna enters play: Add 2 [skull] tokens to the chaos bag. If Eye of Vecna leaves play, remove 2 [skull] tokens from the chaos bag. [reaction] When an investigator reveals a [skull] token, exhaust Eye of Vecna: Cancel it and treat it as a token sealed here, instead. (Do not return it to the token pool.)

cards.name: Healer
cards.text:
As an additional cost to commit Healer to a skill test, take 1 damage or 1 horror.
If this test is successful, heal 2 damage or 2 horror (or any combination thereof) from among investigators at your location.

cards.name: Portable Hole
cards.text:
Fast. Uses (2 supplies).
While you have no resources in your resource pool, supplies on Portable Hole may be spent as if they were resources in your resource pool.

cards.name: Inquisitor
cards.text:
As an additional cost to commit Inquisitor to a skill test, place up to 3 of your clues on it.
If you succeed by 1 or more, take control of all clues on Inquisitor and discover that many clues at your location. Otherwise, place all clues on Inquisitor on your location.

cards.name: Absorb Elements
cards.text:
For every 5 cards in your discard pile, Absorb Elements gains [wild].
If this test is successful, for every 5 cards in your discard pile, draw 1 card (to a max of 3).

cards.name: Goblin Raider
cards.text:
[Goblins] Hunter. Surge.
For each other ready [[Goblin]] enemy in play, Goblin Raider gets +1 fight.

cards.name: Worg Rider
cards.text: [Goblins] Spawn - Any connecting location (with a [[Goblin]] enemy, if able). Hunter. Surge. Forced - After Worg Rider moves via the hunter keyword: It gets +1 damage for the remainder of the phase.

cards.name: Goblin Archer
cards.text: [Goblins] Spawn - Any connecting location. Surge. Forced - After you enter Goblin Archer's location, if it is ready: It attacks you.

cards.name: Zealot of the Absolute
cards.text: [Absolutists] Spawn - Any empty location. Elusive. Retaliate. Surge. Forced - At the end of mythos phase, if Zealot of the Absolute has no doom on it: Place 1 doom on it.

cards.name: Inquisitor of the Absolute
cards.text: [Absolutists] Hunter. Forced - After Inquisitor of the Absolute attacks you: Place 1 doom on an asset you control.

cards.name: True Soul
cards.text: [Absolutists] Elusive. Forced - After True Soul moves via its elusive keyword: Place 1 doom on it.

cards.name: Mind Flayer
cards.text: [Illithids] Aloof. Hunter. Forced - After you fail a skill test at Mind Flayer's location: Attach a card at random from your hand to Mind Flayer facedown.

cards.name: Intellect Devourer
cards.text: [Illithids] Aloof. Hunter. Surge. Forced - After you fail a skill test at Intellect Devourer's location: You get [disadvantage] for the next skill test you perform.

cards.name: Tadpole Nursery
cards.text: [Illithids] Aloof. Hunter. Forced - After you fail a skill test at Tadpole Nursery's location: Search the encounter deck and encounter discard pile for an [[Aberration]] enemy and spawn it at Tadpole Nursery's location.

cards.name: Gnoll
cards.text:
[Gnolls] Hunter. Retaliate.
Gnoll gets +1 fight for each damage on it.

cards.name: Hyena
cards.text: [Gnolls] Spawn - Any connecting location, if able. Otherwise, spawn it at your location. Forced - At the end of the round: Search the encounter deck and encounter discard deck for a Gnoll enemy and spawn it at the location of the nearest investigator. Then, discard Hyena.

cards.name: Redcap
cards.text:
[Fey] Concealed 1. Hunter. Surge.
While Redcap is in the shadows, treat all damage as direct damage.

cards.name: Redcap Blood Sage
cards.text:
[Fey] Concealed 1. Hunter. Surge.
While Redcap Blood Sage is in the shadows, treat all horror as direct horror.

cards.name: Auntie Ethel
cards.text: [Fey] Concealed 2. Elusive. Hunter. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if Auntie Ethel is in the shadows: Each investigator, in player order, exposes a concealed card at their location. If it is an enemy, it attacks you. Forced - After Auntie Ethel resolves her elusive keyword: Return her to the shadows and resolve her concealed keyword.

cards.name: Harpy
cards.text: [Beasts] Spawn - Any connecting location, if able. Otherwise, spawn it at your location. Forced - After you take horror: Move once along the shortest path towards a copy of Harpy. For the remainder of the round ignore the Forced ability on each copy of Harpy.

cards.name: Owlbear
cards.text: [Beasts] Alert. Hunter. Forced - When Owlbear attacks via the alert keyword: Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.

cards.name: Entombed Warrior
cards.text: [Undead] Hunter. Forced - When Entombed Warrior is defeated: Instead of discarding it, attach it to its location. Attached location gains: "Forced - After you reveal a [skull] token during a skill test at attached location: You automatically fail, or spawn Entombed Warrior at attached location, exhausted."

cards.name: Entombed Scribe
cards.text: [Undead] Aloof. Hunter. Surge. Forced - After you reveal a [skull] token during a skill test, if Entombed Scribe is ready at your location: You must either reveal an additional token, or choose a copy of Entombed Warrior attached to a location and attach it to this location.

cards.name: Bandit Mage
cards.text: [Bandits] Elusive. Hunter. Surge. Forced - After Bandit Mage engages you, if it is ready: Lose 1 resource.

cards.name: Bandit Grifter
cards.text: [Bandits] Elusive. Hunter. Forced - After Bandit Grifter engages you, if it is ready: Test [agility] (6). If you fail, you must either lose 1 resource for each point you failed by, or Bandit Grifter attacks you.

cards.name: Bandit Brute
cards.text: [Bandits] Hunter. Forced - After Bandit Brute engages you, if it is ready: You must either lose 2 resources or take a basic fight action against it. Bandit Brute gains retaliate during this attack. If you fail by 2 or more, Bandit Brute deals +2 damage.
